title: Hello Bank
fea2: Firebase Authentication with email password and Google account
fea3: Users can find all kinds of banking facilities here.
fea4: Like opening accounts, holding a Card, requesting for a Loan, deposit money, balance transfer etc.
fea5: Admin can control all the users of the bank from the dashboard.
fea6: Email login implemented. Used CRUD operation to manage data with the database.

title: mMarket.com
fea1: This is a resale product based MERN project
fea2: Firebase Authentication with email password and Google account
fea3: Users have to be registered to be able to see the products under different categories
fea4: There are three types of users- Admin Seller and Buyer
fea5: Users Details are saved during registration in the MongoDB database with node.js
fea6: For joining with a google pop-up the user's email is searched in MongoDB
fea7: Custom Hook is created to check user roles from the database

title: Wedding Photographer
fea1: Firebase Authentication with email password and Google account
fea2: Users have to be registered to be able to see the places
fea3: You can search for your favorite place to go there and book a resort
fea5: You can book a place to go there and people are giving reviews in this category card and you can delete your own review
fea6: In there add service section an admin can add a new service
